pkgmetadata.longdescription: Reversible Jump PDMP Samplers // Provides an implementation of the reversible jump piecewise deterministic Markov processes (PDMPs) methods developed in the paper Reversible Jump PDMP Samplers for Variable Selection (Chevallier, Fearnhead, Sutton 2020, arXiv:2010.11771). It also contains an implementation of a Gibbs sampler for variable selection in Logistic regression based on Polya-Gamma augmentation.
